name: SURVIVING HIGH SCHOOL
synopsis: Welcome to Centerscore High, where each choice you make changes your game! But remember, some choices are wiser than others… Play the premiere “Football Season” storyline plus 7 episodes for hours of gameplay. You cause all the drama! Master addictive mini-games and ace pop quizzes along the way. The Trophy System tracks your results. Earn 4 “great endings” and unlock a BONUS EPISODE. Seriously. Best…high-school game…EVER!
